Gameplay

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • Gameplay.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains details concerning the current map in play, and determines if a collision has occurred.
    Author:
    Michael Williams, Keith MacKinnon

    • Constructor Summary

      Generates Map from String
